    • Constructor Detail

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(int x,
              int y,
              int w,
              int h,
              int health)
        Initializes a Sprite with no PImage (img), given center (x,y), width, height and health.
        Parameters:
        x - X-coordinate of top left center.
        y - Y-coordinate of top left center.
        w - width of the Sprite
        h - height of the Sprite
        health - health of the Mario.

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(processing.core.PImage img,
              int x,
              int y,
              int w,
              int h,
              int health)
        Initializes a Sprite with a given PImage (img), given center (x,y), width, height and health.
        Parameters:
        img - PImage that is drawn onto the DrawingSurface of the game that represents the Mario.
        x - X-coordinate of top left center.
        y - Y-coordinate of top left center.
        w - width of the Sprite
        h - height of the Sprite
        health - health of the Mario.
        Postcondition:
        invis, hasW, and weaponUsed are set to false

    • Method Detail

      • moveToLocation

        public void moveToLocation(double x,
                           double y)
        Moves Sprite to specified location
        Parameters:
        x - - x coordinate of new location
        y - - y coordinate of new location
        Precondition:
        x and y coordinates are inside the window limits set in the applyWindowLimits() method

      • moveByAmount

        public void moveByAmount(double x,
                         double y)
        Moves sprite by x and y amount
        Parameters:
        x - - amount that should be moved on the x axis.
        y - - amount that should be moved on the y axis.

      • applyWindowLimits

        public void applyWindowLimits(int windowWidth,
                              int windowHeight)
        Sets the borders of the window
        Parameters:
        windowWidth - - width of the window
        windowHeight - - height of the window
        Postcondition:
        the characters can't move outside the window

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet g)
        Draws the Sprite onto the DrawingSurface using the image field.
        Parameters:
        g - The Processing PApplet on which to draw the Sprite.

      • up

        public void up()
        Moves sprite up by 15

        Moves sprite down by 15

        public void setHealth(int h)
        sets the health of the sprite
        Parameters:
        h - - health that is being set

      • special

        public void special(processing.core.PApplet surface)
        Special move of the sprite; invisiblity. Changes the sprite's image to an "invisible" version, where other Sprites can't attack it.
        Parameters:
        surface - - The Processing PApplet on which to draw the Sprite.

      • getX

        public double getX()
        gets x value of Sprite
        Overrides:
        getX in class java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double

        - x: x-value

      • getY

        public double getY()
        gets y value of Sprite
        Overrides:
        getY in class java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
        Returns:
        - y: y-value

      • attack

        public void attack(Sprite other)
        Method for sprite attacks, where this Sprite deals a random amount of damage to the other Sprite from 1-10. If the other sprite is a Weapon, the weapon is transported into the hands of this Sprite and the Sprite can fire one laser shot. If the other sprite is a HealthBoost, this Sprite gains 50 health.
        Parameters:
        other - - the sprite that is being attacked
        Postcondition:
        Other sprite changes image., This sprite gains health or hasW turns to true.

      • getHealth

        public int getHealth()
        Returns:
        - returns the health

      • getI

        public boolean getI()
        Returns:
        - returns true if the sprite is invisible

      • getW

        public boolean getW()
        Returns:
        - returns true if the sprite has a weapon that can be fired

      • setW

        public void setW(boolean w)
        Parameters:
        w - - sets hasW to true if the weapon has been acquired by this Sprite and sets to false if weapon has been fired
